description:
The elementary school tradition of spiritual cultivation at the temple is underway, and Kan is oddly into it. Meditation and standing under a freezing cold waterfall are all part of the agenda, but nothing compares to what awaits the gang at nightfall.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kowai Monotte Hito Sorezore! no Hanashi
怖いものって人それぞれ! の話
